name: The Weinstein Organization Inc.
description:
The Weinstein Organization, a full-service integrated marketing communications agency, started in 1992 with deep roots in the successful methods of direct marketing, but our vision is focused on the ever-shifting landscape of the 21st century marketplace.
From our humble beginnings, we have grown to a leading integrated marketing communications agency with 15 employees at our downtown Chicago location. The average employee tenure is 10+ years – a very gratifying statistic.
 
We are a highly responsive and nimble marketing services organization known for a strong culture of unparalleled personal service.
We think of ourselves as an extension of your team and a valued strategic partner in your overall success. Our creative ability, winning strategies, team cohesiveness, and exceptional service have produced alliances that have generated industry recognition and most importantly, long-term relationships and repeat business.
Winner of the Professional Insurance Marketing Association (PIMA) Silver Award 2012.
